name: 2021 10th International Conference on Innovation, Knowledge, and Management
content: For papers submitted to ICIKM 2021, we offer the publications as following: 1\. Publication in Proceedings. Accepted papers after undergoing a preliminary review and rigorous peer review will be published in Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, and some other major databases. 2\. Publication in Journal. Selected papers will be published in the International Journal of Innovation, Management and Technology, which will be indexed by Google Scholar, Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Crossref, ProQuest, etc.
